message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that we believe will enhance your daily experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I would like to offer it to you for $120. Let me know if this price aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. I am willing to pay $95 for it. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of this, I would like to propose an adjusted price of $100 for the product. This still reflects its value, while being more accessible to you. Please let me know if this revised offer suits your needs.
